ModMetaData.name: Less Ambrosia Addiction
ModMetaData.author: CP92
ModMetaData.description:
Lowers the chance of an ambrosia addiction from consuming ambrosia by raising the minimum tolerance required from 15% --> 55%.
- Performance impact: None. - Avg load time: 0ms. - Mod is XPath only. - Can safely be added to an existing game. - Can safely be removed from an existing game.
inspired by and credit to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2009275772]Less Beer Addiction by SquirtingElephant[/url]
